sources.title: MOH Iraq Circular 2023/17 - Biosimilars Import Guidance
sources.text: Biosimilars import requires evidence of comparability, GMP, and registration dossier. Distributors must maintain cold-chain as applicable.

sources.title: Kimadia Tender Rules 2024
sources.text: Suppliers shall submit performance bond. Tender evaluation includes price, compliance, and delivery timeline.

sources.title: WHO Iraq Country Profile 2024
sources.text: Key health indicators and supply chain considerations for Iraq.
